subtitle:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,500
Tâi-oân Tâi-gí Choân-kok Chèng-chhek Tiong-pō͘ Lūn-toâⁿ,
The "Taiwan Taigi National Policy Central Forum,"

2
00:00:02,500 --> 00:00:05,000
kin-á-ji̍t tī Tâi-tiong Kàu-io̍k Tāi-ha̍k kí-pān.
was held today at the National Taichung University of Education.

3
00:00:05,000 --> 00:00:07,500
Lâi thó-lūn Tâi-gí ê gí-giân chèng-chhek.
To discuss language policies regarding Taigi.

4
00:00:07,500 --> 00:00:10,200
Beh si̍t-hiān Tâi-gí siā-kûn ê gí-giân khoân-ek.
It aims to realize the linguistic rights of the Taigi community.

5
00:00:10,200 --> 00:00:12,800
Tâi-kha ta̍k-lâng chē kah moá-moá.
Down in the audience, the venue was packed.

6
00:00:12,800 --> 00:00:15,500
Ta̍k-ke lóng sī lâi thó-lūn koan-sim Tâi-gí chèng-chhek ê hoat-tián.
Everyone came to discuss the development of Taigi policy.

7
00:00:15,500 --> 00:00:19,000
Tâi-oân Tâi-gí Choân-kok Chèng-chhek Lūn-toâⁿ Tiong-pō͘ Lūn-toâⁿ,
The Central Session of the Taiwan Taigi National Policy Forum,

8
00:00:19,000 --> 00:00:22,000
28 chit-kang tī Tâi-tiong Kàu-io̍k Tāi-ha̍k kí-pān.
took place on the 28th at Taichung University of Education.

9
00:00:22,000 --> 00:00:24,500
Chú-iàu chiam-tùi Tâi-gí ê gí-giân chèng-chhek,
It primarily focused on language policies,

10
00:00:24,500 --> 00:00:26,500
ì-sek, kap Tâi-gí seng-bōng ê kiàn-li̍p,
public awareness, and establishing the prestige of Taigi,

11
00:00:26,500 --> 00:00:28,500
chit saⁿ toā chú-tê lâi thó-lūn.
discussing these three major themes.

12
00:00:28,500 --> 00:00:32,000
Tiong-Kàu-tāi Tâi-gí-hē chú-jīm, Iûⁿ Ún-giân chí-chhut,
NTCU Taigi Dept. Chair Yang Yun-yan pointed out,

13
00:00:32,000 --> 00:00:35,000
sui-bóng chèng-hú ū kiàn-li̍p Tâi-gí ê gí-liāu-khò͘,
although the government has built a Taigi corpus,

14
00:00:35,000 --> 00:00:37,500
tān-sī liōng siuⁿ chió. Chéng-thé kui-ōe mā bô kàu chiu-chì.
the volume is too small, and the planning is not thorough enough.

15
00:00:37,500 --> 00:00:40,000
Kàu-io̍k-pō͘ ū khai-sí tī leh kiàn-li̍p chia-ê gí-liāu.
"The MOE has started building this data."

16
00:00:40,000 --> 00:00:43,000
Tān-sī in-ūi liōng siuⁿ chió.
"But because the volume is small,"

17
00:00:43,000 --> 00:00:46,000
kî-si̍t hit-ê sok-tō͘ bo̍k-chiân sǹg chin bān.
"the speed is actually very slow right now."

18
00:00:46,000 --> 00:00:48,500
Tē-jī to̍h sī kóng, su-iàu chò chi̍t-koá khah hó ê kui-oē.
"Secondly, better planning is needed."

19
00:00:48,500 --> 00:00:51,500
Bo̍k-chiân kî-si̍t sī á-koh tī chho͘-phoe ê thó-lūn niā.
"We are still just in the preliminary discussion phase."

20
00:00:51,500 --> 00:00:54,500
Iûⁿ Ún-giân jīn-ûi, Tâi-gí ê gí-liāu-khò͘
Yang believes the Taigi corpus

21
00:00:54,500 --> 00:00:57,500
ài chìn-chi̍t-pō͘ chò tn̄g-sû,
needs further processing like word segmentation,

22
00:00:57,500 --> 00:01:00,500
sû-sèng ê piau-kì téng-téng,
and part-of-speech tagging,

23
00:01:00,500 --> 00:01:03,500
bī-lâi ūn-iōng chiah ē-tàng lú choân-bīn.
to be fully utilizable in the future.

24
00:01:03,500 --> 00:01:06,000
Lūn-toâⁿ tiong iā koh-chài thê-chhut sêng-li̍p Tâi-gí choan-chek tan-ūi.
The forum also reiterated the need to establish a dedicated Taigi agency.

25
00:01:06,000 --> 00:01:09,000
Jî-chhiáⁿ ài hō͘ āu-chi̍t-tāi goān-ì khui-chhùi kóng Tâi-gí.
We must encourage the next generation to speak Taigi,

26
00:01:09,000 --> 00:01:11,500
chiah ē-tàng hō͘ Tâi-gí kè-sio̍k siⁿ-thòaⁿ, thoân-sêng.
so the language can continue to spread and be inherited.

27
00:01:11,500 --> 00:01:14,500
Ta̍k-ke lóng chiok jīn-chin leh chò,
"Everyone is working very hard,"

28
00:01:14,500 --> 00:01:16,500
tān-sī hun-sòaⁿ.
"but the problem is... we are scattered."

29
00:01:16,500 --> 00:01:18,500
Kàu-io̍k-pō͘ hoān Kàu-io̍k-pō͘, ha̍k-hāu hoān ha̍k-hāu...
"The MOE stays MOE, schools stay schools..."

30
00:01:18,500 --> 00:01:21,000
Bûn-hoà-pō͘ hoān Bûn-hoà-pō͘...
"The Ministry of Culture remains separate..."

31
00:01:21,000 --> 00:01:24,000
Teh chò mā chiok jīn-chin, tān-sī to̍h-sī bô sio-chiap.
"We work hard, but there is no connection between us."

32
00:01:24,000 --> 00:01:26,500
Tâi-gí hok-chín chit tiâu lō͘,
"On this road of Taigi revitalization,"

33
00:01:26,500 --> 00:01:29,500
kî-si̍t ū chi̍t ê siōng tiōng-iàu ê būn-tê, to̍h-sī kóng,
"the most important question is actually:"

34
00:01:29,500 --> 00:01:32,000
gín-á ài án-choáⁿ chiah ē kah-ì Tâi-gí.
"How do we get children to like Taigi?"

35
00:01:32,000 --> 00:01:34,500
Beh siâⁿ--in kóng, kî-si̍t m̄-sī oân-choân bô phiat-pō͘.
"To coax them into speaking, there are ways."

36
00:01:34,500 --> 00:01:36,500
Goá jīn-ûi Tâi-gí bàng-gà (Manga) ū seng-oa̍h-hoà,
"I believe if Taigi comics/manga are relatable,"

37
00:01:36,500 --> 00:01:39,000
ū chhù-bī-hoà, khah ū hoat-tō͘ siâⁿ gín-á--lah.
"and fun, it will be easier to attract the children."

38
00:01:39,000 --> 00:01:42,500
Ha̍k-chiá kap bîn-kan thoân-thé lóng jīn-ûi,
Scholars and civil groups agree,

39
00:01:42,500 --> 00:01:45,000
Tâi-gí ê thui-tōng,
that promoting Taigi,

40
00:01:45,000 --> 00:01:47,500
m̄-nā sī bûn-hoà pó-chûn ê būn-tê,
is not just a matter of cultural preservation,

41
00:01:47,500 --> 00:01:50,000
mā khan-sia̍p tio̍h chè-tō͘, chu-goân,
but also involves systems, resources,

42
00:01:50,000 --> 00:01:52,500
kap si̍t-chè sú-iōng khoân-kéng.
and actual usage environments.

43
00:01:52,500 --> 00:01:55,000
Chèng-hú bô eng-kai hòng-jīm gí-giân kēng-cheng.
The government should not leave languages to compete alone.

44
00:01:55,000 --> 00:01:57,500
Eng-kai sī ài thê-kiong kàu-gia̍h ê chu-goân,
It should provide sufficient resources,

45
00:01:57,500 --> 00:02:00,000
ku-thé ê chò-hoat, mí-pó͘ koè-khì ê put-chiok.
and concrete measures to make up for past deficiencies.

46
00:02:00,000 --> 00:02:02,500
Hō͘ pún-thó͘ gí-giân koh-khah ū kēng-cheng-le̍k.
Making native languages more competitive.

47
00:02:02,500 --> 00:02:05,000
Kì-chiá Iûⁿ Su-chêng Tâi-tiong pò-tō.
Reported by Yang Shu-ching in Taichung.
